segments.text: There's a major problem with room 507 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . Please tell me the exact problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This room is overrun with cockroaches .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There has been an occasional silverfish in the hotel , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , this hotel just passed a thorough insect inspection with flying colors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your inspector needs spectacles . The fact is that cockroaches are running rampant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I apologize , sir . Just a second , while I transfer you to my supervisor .
segments.speaker: S2
